about:
I'm Loren and in my spare time I'm a passionate climber and mountain biker. On the side, I try to work on projects and try out new technologies as much as my time allows. This is also where my App for climbers came into being, as a digital route book with graphic evaluation.
Professionally, I have been working as a Full Stack Freelancer for Vertical Life and NO-Q since July 2022. Before that I was with DATEV eG in Nürnberg, als Inhouse Consultant angestellt und hier in vielen Projekten tätig. Davor habe ich für das Leibniz Institute for Ecological and Regional Development as a research assistant. During this time I designed and implemented the IÖR-Monitor, which is used as a cartographic information medium on land use issues. I am passionate about writing test-driven clean code and always try to keep up to date. state of the art.
